name: Bouncy Ball - jumping soccer ball platform rush - hypercasual game ready for release
name_original: Bouncy Ball - jumping soccer ball platform rush - hypercasual game ready for release
description:
This project is fully functional game. Game is ready for release.
* * * * * * * * * * * * * * *
Drag finger across the screen to move the ball. Main goal is to reach as high as you can. Game is endless and as it progress it becomes harder and harder.
* * * * * * * * * * * * * * *
I hope you will like this template and please check out my other projects.

Thank you!
